author: Valerie Bauerlein
title: A Gift No School Wants to Receive
text:
It has been driven across the country in a snowstorm, prayed over and presented in ceremony after ceremony from Columbine, Colo., to Newtown, Conn., and, most recently, Townville, S.C.
It is the gift no school wants to receive.
It is a 19-year-old dreamcatcher in a poster-size frame, a talisman that has been passed among communities bound... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
